Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Difference was really that i get more feedback thats probably better in the sense that the teacher knows the course back to front but the AI doesnt. But the accessibility of GenAI was very helpfull when i am at home studying i dont need to wait for email replies.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Maybe more confident when i ask the teacher as the teacher knows what they want to see when they mark it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Not much else just accessibility vs trustworthiness not of information but relevance
